languages.text: {n}Боевая машина перед вами не на ходу и годами не видела должного ухода, но сомнений нет: {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}под вашим управлением{/d} она будет исправно нести смерть и разрушение.{/n}

{n}The war machine before you is not in running order and has not been properly serviced in years, but there is no doubt that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}under your control{/d}, it can still sow death and destruction.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Kriegsmaschine vor dir ist nicht gefechtsbereit und wurde über Jahre nicht korrekt gewartet, aber {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}unter deiner Kontrolle{/d} kann sie ohne Zweifel immer noch Tod und Vernichtung säen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The war machine before you is not in running order and has not been properly serviced in years, but there is no doubt that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}under your control{/d}, it can still sow death and destruction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kriegsmaschine vor dir ist nicht gefechtsbereit und wurde über Jahre nicht korrekt gewartet, aber {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}unter deiner Kontrolle{/d} kann sie ohne Zweifel immer noch Tod und Vernichtung säen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La machine de guerre qui se tient devant vous ne fonctionne pas. Elle n'a pas été entretenue depuis des années, mais {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}sous votre contrôle{/d}, vous n'avez aucun doute qu'elle pourra semer la destruction.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The war machine before you is not in running order and has not been properly serviced in years, but there is no doubt that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}under your control{/d}, it can still sow death and destruction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La machine de guerre qui se tient devant vous ne fonctionne pas. Elle n'a pas été entretenue depuis des années, mais {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}sous votre contrôle{/d}, vous n'avez aucun doute qu'elle pourra semer la destruction.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这台战争机器的状况并不理想，已经很多年没得到过适当的维护。但毫无疑问，{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}在你的操作之下{/d}，它依然可以散播死亡与毁灭。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The war machine before you is not in running order and has not been properly serviced in years, but there is no doubt that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}under your control{/d}, it can still sow death and destruction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这台战争机器的状况并不理想，已经很多年没得到过适当的维护。但毫无疑问，{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}在你的操作之下{/d}，它依然可以散播死亡与毁灭。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La máquina de guerra que tienes ante ti ni está en buen estado ni ha recibido un mantenimiento digno en años, pero no cabe duda de que, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}bajo tu control{/d}, aún puede sembrar muerte y destrucción.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The war machine before you is not in running order and has not been properly serviced in years, but there is no doubt that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}under your control{/d}, it can still sow death and destruction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La máquina de guerra que tienes ante ti ni está en buen estado ni ha recibido un mantenimiento digno en años, pero no cabe duda de que, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}bajo tu control{/d}, aún puede sembrar muerte y destrucción.{/n}

languages.text: {n}目の前の戦争機械は何年もまともに整備されておらず、稼働状態にない。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}あなたの指揮下{/d}であれば、それでも死と破壊をもたらす力を秘めているに違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The war machine before you is not in running order and has not been properly serviced in years, but there is no doubt that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}under your control{/d}, it can still sow death and destruction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}目の前の戦争機械は何年もまともに整備されておらず、稼働状態にない。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}あなたの指揮下{/d}であれば、それでも死と破壊をもたらす力を秘めているに違いない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Önündeki savaş makinesi çalışır durumda değil ve yıllardır kullanılmamış ama {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}senin kontrolündeyken{/d} ölüm ve facia saçacağına şüphe yok.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The war machine before you is not in running order and has not been properly serviced in years, but there is no doubt that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}under your control{/d}, it can still sow death and destruction.{/n}
